text.div:
MedicationRequestPatientFamilyNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient.family:string

Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient.family={familyName}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: MedicationRequestPatientFamilyNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient.family={familyName}
